options.name: Action : Hamstring
options.description: You make an Attack with a Slashing Weapon at a Huge or smaller Creature that has legs in an attempt to Damage them. If the Attack hits, the Creature has a maximum Movement Speed of 2 Units until the end of their next turn.

options.name: Reaction : Sharp Parry
options.description: In response to being the Target of a Melee Attack, you make an Attack with a Heavy Slashing Weapon instead of a Defense Check. If the result of your Check is higher, you deal Damage to the Target equal to your Bonus Damage Modifier and avoid the Attack.

options.name: Sense Weakness
options.description: Gain 1d4 Attack to Creatures that have at least 3 Conditions on them. Additionally, if a Creature is Unconscious, the Damage on your Attack is doubled.

options.name: Action : Guillotine
options.description: You make an Attack against a Creature that is Prone, dealing an extra 2d10 Primary Damage on a hit. The Dice become 4d10 if you score a Critical Hit.
